Room.Name: Melbourne Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Melbourne Avenue, west of the Chug-A-Lug Pub.
Room.LongDescription: The Chug-A-Lug is a popular hang out for students, drunks, vagrants and just about anyone else who lives in this area of town. Ironically, the pub probably does more business than any other store or shop in the area. On the west side of the road is Roman Iron Works, where a number of light, iron weapons may be purchased.
